reviews.sentence: Great stay. First stay at this location and had a great stay. The check in and out went very smoothly with helpful and friendly staff willing to give directions or any assistance we might need. Breakfast was continental but as advertised. Room had been remodeled and was very spacious with small kitchen table and chairs. All was very clean and comfortable and we had a very enjoyable trip. We will definitely return to this location and nearby beach within walking distance was huge plus.

Thoroughly Enjoyed. You do not come to this Travelodge for the luxurious accommodations. You come because it is located one block from Windansea the rooms are nicely sized and clean the staff are knowledgeable friendly and genuinely helpful and you come because this is a La Jola institution providing a safe clean quiet place to stay while you focus on one of the most beautiful locations on earth. I would chose this little Travelodge over the La Valencia any day.
Hidden gem with great staff super value for the money. Pool and hot tub are great. Also lots of cable stations with a station guide a small but super thoughtful benefitLamps are a bit dated worn.

Great value. I liked everything about this hotel. The beds and pillows were very comfortable. It was clean the staff was very friendly. Its a great location close to the beach shopping and attractions. All of this was at an affordable price. I would stay again and would recommend it to anyone.
Very conveniently located. People in hotel reception was really helpful during the stay. The breakfast is godit is a bit expensive for the kind of hotel it is.
Confortable place to stay friendly staff. TERRIFIC location. The office staff was incredible. Very friendly and informative. Terrific location.

Close to the beach only two blocks. Rooms were clean and good size except for the few rooms that were under the stairs and dark. But we asked for another room and were immediately accommodated. Beds were comfortable staff was friendly adequate pool and spa. Breakfast was just right and there was unlimited tea coffee bottled water and fruit all day. Bus stop on the corner takes you to downtown SD and Pacific beach if you want to avoid parking hustle close enough to La Jola Cove on foot about 30 min slow walk but very short drive there and to La Jola Shores. The local beach was only two blocks away short and pleasant walk. It was a bit rocky but heaven for surfers but there were patches of sandy areas where the water was calm and swimable. Few near by places to eat close to the hotel but better restaurants were in the La Jola cove area with healthier choices and better views. Lights above bed were centered over the head board and were a bit low banged my head few times while sitting in bed.

Enjoyable and relaxing stay in a beautiful location. The location is what makes this hotel as it is so near to a beautiful beach within 5 mins walk. The hotel was comfy and clean but somewhat dated. Bathroom was clean but had seen better days. A refurb needed to make it really good. Good complementary continental breakfast that you could take to you room. Staff very welcoming and friendly. The Mandarin Chinese restaurant across the road was excellent. Local bus possible into town very near La Jola shores with nice restaurants and bars overlooking the ocean. Get sun setsAlthough advertised with pool it was tiny and frankly it did not look clean. It was also in a very small space and not particularly enticing.
Perfect value for money. Love the location very friendly staff good breakfast clean and spacious rooms.

The room renovation was actually quite nice however the ongoing construction was very inconvenient. The staff made our 3 day stay tolerable but I would not go back there until at least the construction was complete. Even then it is probably at best a 3 on a 5 point scale. Parking is really tight breakfast was really minimal and carb heavy and the location was not as good as I had thought.

The room renovations are outstanding. What a huge difference from last summer. The breakfast area needs to be more regularly cleaned and restocked. Each morning we came down there were not napkins or coffee cups. The last morning there was no orange juice at 9 AM. Someone should be refreshing it regularly and wiping up the tables and service areas.

Everything was broken totally understaffed get locked in and out of the pool constantly and have to yell for the staff to let you out no butter at the breakfast counter. Poor service over all. Only nice thing was that you could rent bikes for 10 an hour per person.

Exceptional. The location is GREAT. And close to the beach. Staff were amazing. WiFi did not work in my room but when I notified front desk it was fixed within 10 minutes. So they really try their best to give you a great experience. Plus the fridge and microwave in the room makes self catering such a pleasure when traveling. I like to eat healthy and prefer self catering. And good value for money. Big room. A HUGE thumbs up.
Very comfortable and clean in a great location. Check in out was slow due to computer issues but staff was very friendly and polite. Great price. Will definitely stay again.

Luckily the room we had was clean and well appointed. Newly renovated and clean. Bokingcom did not communicate with Shoal hotel the type of room I reserved. So when we got there desk rep said the only room left was the standard king room and not the king de luxe.

Bad experience. Bed is soft. 字數限制負評無法翻譯，但大家參考一下吧！On the day we checked in and entered the room we found that there is no shampoo and body wash in the room. Then we just took a shower by warm water. But next day after we checked out a staff called us and told us she ’s gon na charge me 10 cuz we took the shampoo away. We gently explained that we did n’t take anything away the truth is they forgot to put shampoo and body wash in our room. We explained for almost 10mins and she just said ‘ I still have to charge you 10. We NEVER forget to put shampoo in the rooms ’. We felt a bit angry. This kind of attitude is so RUDE. We explained but you do n’t ever trust your customers. Next morning we called to the hotel and explained why we want to talk to the manager. The staff said ‘ We apologize we found that it was a mistake. So we will not charge you. We apologize again for this mistake. ’It feels so bad to be treated like a thief.

Bad experience. Bed is soft. 字數限制負評無法翻譯，但大家參考一下吧！On the day we checked in and entered the room we found that there is no shampoo and body wash in the room. Then we just took a shower by warm water. But next day after we checked out a staff called us and told us she ’s gon na charge me 10 cuz we took the shampoo away. We gently explained that we did n’t take anything away the truth is they forgot to put shampoo and body wash in our room. We explained for almost 10mins and she just said ‘ I still have to charge you 10. We NEVER forget to put shampoo in the rooms ’. We felt a bit angry. This kind of attitude is so RUDE. We explained but you do n’t ever trust your customers. Next morning we called to the hotel and explained why we want to talk to the manager. The staff said ‘ We apologize we found that it was a mistake. So we will not charge you. We apologize again for this mistake. ’It feels so bad to be treated like a thief.

One star is for the hotel staff in the front office. They are sweet girls. The other star is for location as you can walk to the beach. Lack of stars for the following. First night our good old neighbors were blasting their tv so loud our room was shaking there was constant fighting which I do n’t know if it was due to the people or the movie. Went to front desk to ask if we could switch rooms and they said the people were checking out that day. Okay fine. Then called to say they asked them to check out early due to the inconvenience. They only had an hour left before they had to check out but I appreciated the gesture. Second and third mornings I discovered room 21 is right next to the cleaning ladies who scream their good morning conversations to each other right in front of our room waking us up in kind of an annoying manner with more screaming and yelling every morning. Cute place but thankfully it ’s our last night. If room 21 is offered do n’t take the cleaning staff is in their defense and just doing their job. But try to have some respect for ur guests who are tired after long days of sight seeing and surfing. All in all not worth the 159 charged us per night. Spa is yellow as well and does n’t seem very clean. Again cute place but not worth the issues.
I thought it was a good value and very clean place. It had a good vibe. Great location. Staff was great and very friendlyAir conditioner was bothersome. It turned off and on constantly.

A convenient well priced well located little motel with a lovely quirky charm. Great location and price. Modern decor. Not super fancy but very nice and clean. Had fridge and microwave so I was able to chill my beverages for the morning and make a snack using the microwave. The parking is first come first served but I got lucky and found a nice roomy spot in front where I felt my car was secure and not likely to get dinged by neighboring car doors my assessment turned out to be corectI did n’t know the front desk closed at 11 pm. I arrived around 130pm and saw the sign on the door. Luckily the person on duty saw me outside and opened the door to check me in. Initially he could not find my reservation but I had correspondence emails where I had asked about parking so he contacted the person I ’d communicated with to ask where he might find my info and after a bit he did find my reservation and checked me in. After that the experience was perfect.
